description: Schema for xfocsp-error-report pings as documented at https://firefox-source-docs.mozilla.org/toolkit/components/telemetry/telemetry/data/xfocsp-error-report-ping.html

csp_header.description: The CSP: frame-ancestors value in the response HTTP header.

error_type.description: The type of what error triggers this ping.

frame_hostname.description: The hostname of the frame which triggers the error.

frame_uri.description: The uri of the frame which triggers the error. This excludes the query strings.

top_hostname.description: The hostname of the top-level page which loads the frame.

top_uri.description: The uri of the top-level page which loads the frame. This excludes the query strings.

xfo_header.description: The X-Frame-Options value in the response HTTP header.

title: xfocsp-error-report
